author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: (سورة الملوك) ثمّ ذكّر حين الذي وردتَ في المدينة وظنّوا وكلاء السلطان بأنّك لن تعرف أصولهم
translation: Call Thou to remembrance Thine arrival in the City (Constantinople), how the Ministers of the Sulṭán thought Thee to be unacquainted with their laws and regulations, and believed Thee to be one of the ignorant.
